scripts.pushSpotify: yarn run build && node dist/src/pushExtension && (wscat --connect $(curl http://localhost:9222/json/list | json -ga webSocketDebuggerUrl) --execute '{"id":1,"method":"Page.reload"}') && (wscat --connect $(curl http://localhost:9223/json/list | json -ga webSocketDebuggerUrl) --execute '{"id":1,"method":"Page.reload"}')
